pages.text: Animal breeding has never been easier!

Mobs that could be tempted will look for a feeding trough with their favorite food. A chicken will look for feeding trough with seeds inside, a pig for carrots and so on. Mobs will act like if the player feed them, entering in love and eventually breeding.

pages.title: Lift with your Knees
pages.text: You can pick up animals (or any mob/entity) with two empty hands and a sneak + right-click!
